mapper.update: UPDATE DATAGEAR_HTML_CHART_WIDGET SET HCW_NAME = #{entity.name}, HCW_PLUGIN_ID = #{entity.htmlChartPlugin.id}, HCW_UPDATE_INTERVAL = #{entity.updateInterval}, HCW_AP_ID = #{entity.analysisProject.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE HCW_ID = #{entity.id}
mapper.select: SELECT T.* FROM () T WHERE T.${_iq_}id${_iq_} = #{id}

SELECT HCW_ID AS ${_iq_}widgetId${_iq_}, DS_ID AS ${_iq_}dataSetId${_iq_}, DS_PROPERTY_SIGNS AS ${_iq_}propertySignsJson${_iq_}, DS_ALIAS AS ${_iq_}alias${_iq_}, DS_ATTACHMENT AS ${_iq_}attachment${_iq_}, DS_PARAM_VALUES AS ${_iq_}paramValuesJson${_iq_}, DS_ORDER AS ${_iq_}order${_iq_} FROM DATAGEAR_HCW_DS WHERE HCW_ID = #{widgetId}
SELECT T.DATA_ID as ${_iq_}dataId${_iq_}, T.DATA_PERMISSION as ${_iq_}dataPermission${_iq_} FROM () T WHERE T.DATA_ID = #{item}

choose.otherwise: SELECT T0.*, T1.DATA_PERMISSION as ${_iq_}dataPermission${_iq_} FROM () T0 INNER JOIN () T1 ON T0.${_iq_}id${_iq_} = T1.DATA_ID WHERE T1.DATA_PERMISSION IS NOT NULL AND T1.DATA_PERMISSION >= ${DP_MIN_READ_PERMISSION}

mapper.sql: SELECT A.HCW_ID AS DP_AUTH_DATA_ID, A.HCW_CREATE_USER_ID AS DP_AUTH_DATA_CREATOR_ID FROM DATAGEAR_HTML_CHART_WIDGET A

SELECT A.HCW_ID AS ${_iq_}id${_iq_}, A.HCW_NAME AS ${_iq_}name${_iq_}, A.HCW_PLUGIN_ID AS ${_iq_}htmlChartPlugin.id${_iq_}, A.HCW_PLUGIN_ID AS ${_iq_}chartPluginName${_iq_},/*默认设置为插件ID，避免页面排序报错*/ A.HCW_UPDATE_INTERVAL AS ${_iq_}updateInterval${_iq_}, A.HCW_CREATE_USER_ID AS ${_iq_}createUser.id${_iq_}, , A.HCW_CREATE_TIME AS ${_iq_}createTime${_iq_}, AP.* FROM DATAGEAR_HTML_CHART_WIDGET A LEFT JOIN DATAGEAR_USER USR ON A.HCW_CREATE_USER_ID = USR.USER_ID LEFT JOIN () AP ON A.HCW_AP_ID = AP.${_iq_}analysisProject.id${_iq_}
